alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:16AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Forest and southwestern Florence Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 116 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Headwaters Wilderness, or 11 miles north of Crandon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crandon, Headwaters Wilderness, North Otter Creek Natural Area, Laona, Argonne, Armstrong Creek, Blackwell, Hiles, Otter Springs Recreation Area and Cavour. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
